title: Grim Fandango Remastered ver. 1.4.0 MAC OS X - GOG
description:

Included FREE goodies: 
*HD wallpaper 
*Making of Grim Fandango Remastered Parts 1-3

About: Something's rotten in the land of the dead, and you're 
being played for a sucker. Meet Manny Calavera, travel agent 
at the Department of Death. He sells luxury packages to souls 
on their four-year journey to eternal rest. But there's trouble 
in paradise. Help Manny untangle himself from a conspiracy that 
threatens his very salvation.

One of the most acclaimed adventure games of all time is now back, 
better than ever. Grim Fandango's epic story of four years in the 
life (or death) of Manny Calavera, travel agent to the dead, has 
been remastered to look, sound, and control even better than when 
it won GameSpot's Game of the Year award upon its original launch. 
Grim Fandango still stands as a classic of the genre, with 
unforgettable characters and unique combination of film noir and 
Mexican folklore.

Grim Fandango Remastered includes:

* Repainted, hi-res character textures
* New, dynamic lighting
* Classic score re-recorded with a full live orchestra
* Over 2 hours of exclusive developer commentary
* Concept art browser

NOTE: The Remastered version doesn't have a manual, but there are 
some in-game instructions. I did include the manual for the 
original version
